languages.text: {n}Джай нежно улыбается, будто пытается смягчить грубость слов.{/n} "Прости, {name}, но мне на это насрать. Я себе такая не нравлюсь и не хочу себя такой чувствовать. Так что оставь жалость и поддержку себе — я не раненая девочка, которую нужно оберегать. Я оклемаюсь и со временем соберу себе новую маску, получше".

{n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай нежно улыбается, будто пытается смягчить грубость слов.{/n} "Прости, {name}, но мне на это насрать. Я себе такая не нравлюсь и не хочу себя такой чувствовать. Так что оставь жалость и поддержку себе — я не раненая девочка, которую нужно оберегать. Я оклемаюсь и со временем соберу себе новую маску, получше".

I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

languages.text: {n}婕伊露出了甜甜的笑容，似乎想要努力缓和她粗鲁的语气。{/n}“不好意思，{name}，我他妈的才不在乎呢。我不喜欢现在的我，也不想变成现在这个样子。你的怜悯和安慰你自己收好吧，我可不是什么受了伤的小姑娘，需要你保护。我会振作起来，掸掉身上的泥巴。假以时日，我会给我自己做个新的面具，做个更好的面具。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊露出了甜甜的笑容，似乎想要努力缓和她粗鲁的语气。{/n}“不好意思，{name}，我他妈的才不在乎呢。我不喜欢现在的我，也不想变成现在这个样子。你的怜悯和安慰你自己收好吧，我可不是什么受了伤的小姑娘，需要你保护。我会振作起来，掸掉身上的泥巴。假以时日，我会给我自己做个新的面具，做个更好的面具。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは、その言葉の粗雑さを和らげようとするかのように、甘く微笑む{/n}「ごめんね、{name}、でもどうでもいいんだ。アタシはこんな自分が好きじゃないし、こんな気持ちになりたくない。だから、同情や慰めは自分の胸にしまっておいて…アタシはアンタの保護が必要な傷ついた少女じゃないんだ。アタシは自分を取り戻して、埃を払い、そのうち自分自身のために新しい仮面を作るよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは、その言葉の粗雑さを和らげようとするかのように、甘く微笑む{/n}「ごめんね、{name}、でもどうでもいいんだ。アタシはこんな自分が好きじゃないし、こんな気持ちになりたくない。だから、同情や慰めは自分の胸にしまっておいて…アタシはアンタの保護が必要な傷ついた少女じゃないんだ。アタシは自分を取り戻して、埃を払い、そのうち自分自身のために新しい仮面を作るよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae esboza una dulce sonrisa, como si intentase paliar la tosquedad de sus palabras:{/n} «Lo siento, {name}, pero es que me importa una mierda. Yo no me prefiero así ni me gusta sentirme de este modo. Así que guárdate tu consuelo y tu compasión; no soy una niña afligida a la que debas proteger. Me levantaré solita, me sacudiré el polvo y con el tiempo me fabricaré una máscara nueva, una mejor que la anterior».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae esboza una dulce sonrisa, como si intentase paliar la tosquedad de sus palabras:{/n} «Lo siento, {name}, pero es que me importa una mierda. Yo no me prefiero así ni me gusta sentirme de este modo. Así que guárdate tu consuelo y tu compasión; no soy una niña afligida a la que debas proteger. Me levantaré solita, me sacudiré el polvo y con el tiempo me fabricaré una máscara nueva, una mejor que la anterior».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sourit aimablement, comme pour tenter d'adoucir la brutalité de ses paroles :{/n} « Désolée, {name}, mais j'en ai rien à foutre. Moi, je me préférais avant et je veux pas me sentir comme ça. Alors vous pouvez bien garder votre pitié et votre réconfort pour vous, je suis pas une gamine blessée qui a besoin d'être protégée. Je vais me relever, m'épousseter et avec le temps, je me fabriquerai un nouveau masque, encore mieux que le précédent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sourit aimablement, comme pour tenter d'adoucir la brutalité de ses paroles :{/n} « Désolée, {name}, mais j'en ai rien à foutre. Moi, je me préférais avant et je veux pas me sentir comme ça. Alors vous pouvez bien garder votre pitié et votre réconfort pour vous, je suis pas une gamine blessée qui a besoin d'être protégée. Je vais me relever, m'épousseter et avec le temps, je me fabriquerai un nouveau masque, encore mieux que le précédent. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt lieblich, als wolle sie ihre rohen Worte etwas abschwächen:{/n} "Tut mir leid, {name}, aber das ist mir scheißegal. Ich ziehe sie nicht vor und ich will mich auch gar nicht so fühlen. Behaltet also Euer Mitleid und Euren Trost – ich bin kein gebrochenes kleines Mädchen, das von Euch beschützt werden muss. Ich werde wieder aufstehen und mir mit der Zeit eine neue Maske schaffen, eine bessere."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lächelt lieblich, als wolle sie ihre rohen Worte etwas abschwächen:{/n} "Tut mir leid, {name}, aber das ist mir scheißegal. Ich ziehe sie nicht vor und ich will mich auch gar nicht so fühlen. Behaltet also Euer Mitleid und Euren Trost – ich bin kein gebrochenes kleines Mädchen, das von Euch beschützt werden muss. Ich werde wieder aufstehen und mir mit der Zeit eine neue Maske schaffen, eine bessere."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tatlı tatlı gülümseyen Jae, sözlerindeki kabalığı yumuşatmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm {name} ama zerre umurumda değil. Ben kendimi böyle tercih etmiyorum ve böyle hissetmek de istemiyorum. O yüzden acımanı da tesellini de başına çal. Korumana ihtiyaç duyan, yaralı bir kedi yavrusu değilim. Kendi kendime ayağa kalkar, üzerimdeki tozu temizler ve zaman içinde kendime yeni, daha iyi bir maske yaparım."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles sweetly as though trying to soften the crudeness of her words:{/n} "Sorry, {name}, but I don't give a shit. I don't prefer me this way and I don't want to feel like this. So keep your pity and comfort to yourself — I'm not a wounded little girl who needs your protection. I'll pick myself up, dust myself off, and in time, I'll make a new mask for myself, a better one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, gülümsemesi, sözlerindeki kabalığı yumuşatsın istiyor gibi tatlı tatlı gülümsüyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm {name} ama zerre umurumda değil. Ben kendimi böyle tercih etmiyorum ve böyle hissetmek de istemiyorum. O yüzden acımanı da tesellini de başına çal. Ben korumana ihtiyaç duyan yaralı bir kedi yavrusu değilim. Kendi kendime ayağa kalkar, üzerimdeki tozu temizler ve zaman içinde kendime yeni ve daha iyi bir maske yaparım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
